Method Summary
static HTTPXInputStream getHTTPXInputStream(HTTPXAbstractMessage message)
          Returns the appropriate type of input stream for reading the content of this message, that means either plain or chunked input stream according to the Transfer-Encoding header field of message.

getHTTPXInputStream

public static HTTPXInputStream getHTTPXInputStream(HTTPXAbstractMessage message)
Returns the appropriate type of input stream for reading the content of this message, that means either plain or chunked input stream according to the Transfer-Encoding header field of message.

Parameters:
message -
Returns:
either HTTPXChunkedInputStream or HTTPXPlainInputStream according to the Transver-Coding header field of message.
